name: Fall for Dance North Festival
description:
Returning for its eleventh annual season, featuring more than 30 Canadian and international artists.

Under the new leadership of Festival Director Lily Sutherland and Artistic Director Robert Binet, the festival showcases three mixed Signature Programmes: AFROFUSION, HOMEGROWN, and KATHAK and BALLET. 

Festival highlights include performances from The Royal Ballet, Kathak sensations Tanveer Alam and Barkha Patel, and a world premiere from Artist-in-Residence Esie Mensah, among other local and international dance artists. 

New this year, Up Next at OCAD University spotlights groundbreaking artists in an audience directed experience, including timed entry and freedom to move throughout the space. Intimate Pairings offers the exhilaration of a front row seat in an easily enjoyable setting.
